channel.title: 508 HD Map Loading Problem
channel.description:
I used to use Moparscape a lot a year or too ago, but since then, 508 HD clients and servers came out so I chose to give it a try.. I have a server and client, both running, but I hit a roadblock.. I don't know if this issue has been addressed before (if it has, please show me the post or tutorial), but when I attempt to, for example, teleport to a certain location on tutorial island, the game crashes with an array-overload error.
To make sure the map was loadable, I ran from Edgeville to Draynor with no crashes whatsoever, but the second I attempted to go below a certain y-coordinate (approximately 3100 or thereabouts), the game crashed. I believe it is the client or the cache, but I am not 100% sure.
I am not looking for an easy way out of this - if the problem is being worked on by a development team, I'd love to help.
Thanks,
Realm of Darkness - Owner[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2009, 11:32:47 pm[/size][hr]List of Locations that Don't Work:
-Going too far west on karamja (towards Brimhaven from the F2P Docks) -Below a certain point on tutorial island (I can teleport to the northern tip of the island (around the bank), but no lower)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2009, 08:31:52 am[/size][hr]Can someone help? :eek:

item.title: 508 HD Map Loading Problem
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
